mapper.select:
SELECT ydr.id, ydr.file_name AS fileName, ydr.file_content AS fileContent, ydr.daily_rep_time AS dailyrepTime, yfb.feed_content AS feedContent, ysrf.id fileId, ysrf.daily_rep_id AS fileMasterId, ysrf.name, ysrf.file_md5 fileMd5 FROM ys_daily_rep ydr LEFT JOIN ys_daily_rep_file ysrf ON ydr.id = ysrf.daily_rep_id LEFT JOIN ys_daily_feed_back yfb ON yfb.daily_rep_id = ydr.id WHERE 1=1
and ydr.id=#{id}

SELECT ydrf.id, ydrf.name AS fjName, ydrf.file_url AS fileUrl, ydrf.file_size AS fileSize FROM ys_daily_rep_file ydrf LEFT JOIN ys_daily_rep ydr ON ydr.id = ydrf.daily_rep_id WHERE ydr.id = #{id} AND ydrf.del_flag = 0
